name: Asami
text:
Asami
Asami is the wife of Ken.
Biography
When visiting Twin Peaks, Washington, Asami became lost after sending a postcard from the Great Northern Hotel to her husband, Ken. When her room was searched, all that was found was a photo of her in front of a car and a deer head.
Her car, a Von Singer Vibel, was found at Big Ed's Gas Farm with a triangle of red snooker balls in the front seat, and an origami swan was left for Ken at the Double R Diner.
She was found in the Black Lodge by Dale Cooper. She was reunited with her husband and they celebrated with Georgia Coffee.
